title: Arumukhan pOl
sahitya:
Arumukhan pOl aruL kUruvOrum uNDO


anupallavi

  sIraDi tanadai sEra cendUr vandOrkku vAri aruLai vazhangum vaLLaAi viLangum


caraNam    vAri mOdum alai pOl varaiyilAdu mEnmEl vandu mOdum kavalaiyAl nondu vADum anbar
tIra vENum nAn paDum tollaiyellAm enru kOrip-paNindAl karuNai koNDE kanindiDum
